Fault.name: BPEL/LdapBpelProcessForSearch.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::searchResultEntry" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.

Fault.name: BPEL/LdapBpelProcessForSearch.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::value" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.
